ta.title: ஜகாத் பிரியங்கரா சனத் நிஷாந்தாவை நியமித்தார்
body_lines: .. ஜகாத் பிரியங்கரா ஒரு சாமுர்தி மேம்பாட்டு மேலாளர்.

en.title: Jagath Priyankara appointed Sanath Nishantha
body_lines: Jagath Priyankara, who was contesting for the last election of the death of Mr. Sanath Nishantha, has been eligible for the post of Vacant Puttalam District Parliamentary Parliamentary Parliamentary Parliamentary Parliamentary Parliament. Jagath Priyankara is a Samurdhi Development Manager.

summary_lines: Jagath Priyankara, a Samurdhi Development Manager, has been appointed to the vacant Puttalam District Parliamentary seat, following the death of Sanath Nishantha.
